verses.name: Romans 10:18
verses.text: But I say, Have they not heard? Yes verily, their sound went into all the earth, and their words unto the ends of the world.

verses.name: Romans 10:19
verses.text: But I say, Did not Israel know? First Moses saith, I will provoke you to jealousy by them that are no people, and by a foolish nation I will anger you.

verses.name: Romans 10:20
verses.text: But Esaias is very bold, and saith, I was found of them that sought me not; I was made manifest unto them that asked not after me.
